SEARCH
Package controller

Class MovieController

java.lang.Object
controller.MovieController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class MovieController extends Object implements IController
This class represents a MovieController that manages the Model and interacts with the View. It implements the IController interface; owns FilterController and ComparisonController.
